mapper.select: SELECT d.detail_id , d.store_id , s.store_name, s.store_tel, s.store_address, s.store_url, d.detail_postdt, d.user_mail, u.user_nickname, d.detail_menu , d.detail_price , d.detail_rating , d.detail_review_flag , d.detail_review , d.detail_image , d.detail_memo , d.detail_usedt , d.detail_visits FROM detail AS d INNER JOIN stores AS s ON d.store_id = s.store_id INNER JOIN users AS u ON d.user_mail = u.user_mail ORDER BY d.detail_usedt
